describe_me: Always in search of exciting challenges that allow me to grow. Music and creativity drive me in development. Ready to contribute my talent to inspiring projects.
invitation_from_colombia: Together, we'll conquer new horizons and explore the unknown!
Planet1: Development of various web pages, meeting the established requirements, and enhancing the user experience by 80%.
Planet2: Implement various tables with appropriate validations before consuming the service.
FCT1: Re-structuring 100% of the site to make it more user-friendly.
FCT2: Spearheaded client conversations, developed a roadmap for feature prioritization, and led a team of 3 developers to implement 10 features.
Globant1: Develop +6 repositories, putting into practice design patterns, unit tests, and functional programming.
Globant2: Incorporation of sound principles and asynchronous operations in +2 repositories, so that they can be scalable.
